name: What is this?
description: What is this? No one knows. You can explore this game first! Then share the secrets of this game with your friends. Secret- It is a adventure game where you explore the world. Its short game for now, because its in development. By buying it You support me. The full game version will be realesed when the game will be done 100%. For now there is some bugs, but we will fix it in next version of this game. If You want to help us, You can give us the list of bugs You spotted. If You will buy this game now (in development) You will gain access to it, that means that you wont need to buy the game again when it is fully released. You will need to send me mail.
